project.name: Foco
project.description: Complete rebuild of CRICO as Foco - a modern project management platform with meticulously designed UI matching the /newdesign/ system

tech_stack.styling: Tailwind CSS with custom design tokens

branding.name: Foco
branding.logo: Custom Foco logo (designed to match the aesthetic)

sidebar.nav_links: flex items-center gap-3 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 text-sm

pages.name: Landing Page
pages.design_reference: Clean, modern layout with Foco branding

key_features.name: AI-Powered Suggestions
key_features.description: Ollama integration for smart milestone and task suggestions
key_features.implementation: API routes calling Ollama for content generation

key_features.name: Real-time Collaboration
key_features.description: Live updates using Supabase realtime subscriptions
key_features.implementation: WebSocket connections for live project updates

key_features.name: Advanced Project Views
key_features.description: Table, Kanban, Gantt, and Calendar views
key_features.implementation: Multiple view components with shared data

key_features.name: Team Management
key_features.implementation: Role-based access control with Supabase RLS

implementation_requirements.consistent_spacing: Use design tokens for all spacing and sizing
implementation_requirements.brand_consistency: Foco branding throughout, no Bien.mx references
implementation_requirements.ai_integration: Ollama must be properly configured and accessible
implementation_requirements.authentication_flow: Complete login/register flow with proper redirects

missing_implementation.layout: No sidebar navigation or proper dashboard layout
missing_implementation.styling: No design tokens or color scheme implementation
missing_implementation.pages: Only basic placeholder pages, no actual UI matching designs

Implement sidebar navigation layout matching crico_dashboard/code.html
Create dashboard layout with exact styling from design
Implement project table view with exact styling
Add view mode tabs (Table, Kanban, Gantt, AI, Team, Auto)
Add user avatar and profile dropdown
